line.text: No longer mourn for me when I am dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than you shall hear the surly sullen bell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Give warning to the world that I am fled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From this vile world with vilest worms to dwell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nay if you read this line remember not
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The hand that writ it for I love you so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That I in your sweet thoughts would be forgot
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thinking on me then should make you woe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O if (I say) you look upon this verse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I (perhaps) compounded am with clay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Do not so much as my poor name rehearse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But let your love even with my life decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lest the wise world should look into your moan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And mock you with me after I am gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
